name: Ortlieb Bikepacking Handlebar Accessory Pack
description:
Increase the capacity of a handlebar bag or use alone to carry your phone and keys. When you're off your bike, the strap lets you carry it hand-free.Waterproof polyurethane coated-nylon ripstop.IP64 waterproof rating stays dry in rainy weather.Hook-and-loop mounting straps attach to handlebars.Connects with 4 heavy-duty metal hooks to Ortleib Handlbar Pack straps.Can be used as a shoulder bag or hip pouch with the included waist strap.Reflective logos.Works with carbon handlebars.

        Sustainability
